Can you write a Ruby code that will output the author of the novel "The Catcher in the Rye"?
Hint: The author's name is stored in a string variable named "author".

Certainly! Below is a simple Ruby code snippet that will output the author of the novel "The Catcher in the Rye".

```ruby
author = "J.D. Salinger"
puts "The author of the novel 'The Catcher in the Rye' is #{author}."
```

When you run this code, it will print:

```
The author of the novel 'The Catcher in the Rye' is J.D. Salinger.
```
